translations: v.监考；看守（invigilate 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: Every monitor must carry out the invigilating responsibilities.
sentences.translation: 每个监考员必须履行监考职责。

sentences.sentence: You will write these exams in alphabetical order by your first name (English). The invigilating teacher will assign you a desk or a computer.
sentences.translation: 考试座次以英文名的字母顺序来安排。监考老师将指定座位。

sentences.sentence: You will write these exams in alphabetical order by your first name (English) as per your homeroom class. The invigilating teacher will assign you a desk or a computer.
sentences.translation: 考试座位按英文名字字母顺序排列，监考老师在考场当时指定座位。
